abstract: The Royal Bank of Scotland has short-listed three private equity bidders in the auction for its payment-processing arm, which could be valued at around $3.6 billion, Dow Jones reported.
snippet: The Royal Bank of Scotland has short-listed three private equity bidders in the auction for its payment-processing arm, which could be valued at around $3.6 billion, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: The Royal Bank of Scotland has short-listed three private equity bidders in the auction for its payment-processing arm, which could be valued at around £2.5 billion ($3.6 billion), Dow Jones reported, citing people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: R.B.S. Shortlists 3 Bidders for Payments Unit

abstract: In a more volatile financial world, bankers, money managers and analysts are digging ever deeper for clues about the markets.
snippet: In a more volatile financial world, bankers, money managers and analysts are digging ever deeper for clues about the markets.
lead_paragraph: Everyone on Wall Street watches the Dow. Guy LeBas watches the Cow.

headline.main: Whither Wall Street? Pick Your Indicator
